name: Tetr-I-wasn't expecting this
description:
Push the blocks into place using the white square.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys

You lose when one of the blocks fall of the stage.

The walls gradually lowers and becomes grey, so that only the blocks can pass through so be careful.

This game was a part of the GMTK 2018 game jam

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/jumping.font
